summary: The Apprenticeship API centralizes, enriches and provides datasets and tools related to the entire apprenticeship training offer

catalogueDesDonneesCertification.desc: Consult the data model and search the list of certifications
catalogueDesDonneesCertification.summary: Use a reliable and enriched dataset for your project: coding, validity period, title, domains, continuity, type, and legal basis.

simulateurNpec.desc: Calculate the level of support for a contract, create a budget forecast

depotOffre.desc: Maximize the visibility of your apprenticeship job offers by posting them on the La bonne alternance platform and its partner sites.
depotOffre.summary: Post, modify, or delete your apprenticeship job offers to maximize their visibility by posting them on the {{- lienLba }} platform and its partner sites {{- lienPartenaire }}.

demandeHabilitation.sujet: Request for authorization to post apprenticeship job offers
demandeHabilitation.contenu: Hello, I would like to obtain authorization to post apprenticeship job offers on the La bonne alternance platform.
